alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:38PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN RAPIDES...NORTHERN EVANGELINE...AVOYELLES AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Effie, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Marksville, Bunkie, Simmesport, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Bordelonville, Morrow, Effie, Cottonport, Mansura, Lecompte, Hessmer, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Bayou Chicot, Goudeau, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, and Dupont. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 44 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
